item.title: 824 - Goat Latin
item.description: leetcode Problem A sentence S is given, composed of words separated by spaces. Each word consists of lowercase and uppercase letters only. We would like to convert the sentence to "Goat Latin" (a made-up language similar to Pig Latin.) The rules of Goat Latin are as follows: If a word begins with a vowel (a, e, i, o, or u), append "ma" to the end of the word. For example, the word 'apple' becomes 'applema'.
